properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 2:05AM MST until February 9 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 4 inches.

* WHERE...Judith Gap.

* WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 2 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Expect difficult travel conditions on Highway 191 due
to snow and poor visibility. Northerly wind gusts to 45 mph will
cause blowing and drifting snow late this afternoon and evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 2 AM MST SUNDAY
